Node.Text: Evening. This can't be happening... two deaths, both within such a short time?
Yep. This doesn't look good for some of you. After all, you always keep secrets and seem to have a way with codes.
Oh, is that so? I'll keep that in mind. I'll be going now.
I assure you everything will turn out fine, especially now that the police are here. Plus, the cause of death was just a snake bite.
I know that you're right, but it doesn't help too much. It's going to be awhile before I feel safe at night...
Thank you, Mr. Devlin. Have a good evening.
Evening. You seem familiar with some of the cops in the building. Do you have any clues as to what's going on here?
I do know some people on the force. They haven't been saying much, but they've found that the same poison was the cause of death for both victims. Don't worry, this should all be over soon.
I hope it will. Thank you, Mr. Devlin. Good night.
I have no idea what you're talking about. I'm not that friendly with the police, but I do know that Charles's death is being closely investigated.
Huh, funny, because I recall that you used to be a part of the force with them.
Word gets around, Mr. Devlin. We aren't as naive as you may think. Good night.
